params.text: Mrefu na Mfupi
Pa ananiletea kofia yangu.
Pa ni mrefu.
Ma ananiletea shati langu.
Pa ni mrefu kuliko Ma.
Dada yangu ananichukua kitabu changu.
Mama ni mrefu kuliko dada yangu.
Kaka yangu ananiletea begi langu.
Dada yangu ni mrefu kuliko kaka yangu.
Kaka yangu ni mrefu kuliko mimi.
Mimi ni mfupi kuliko wote kwenye familia.
Oh subiri! Huyo hapo mbwa wetu, Jojo.
Jojo anachukua ndala zangu.
Haha! Jojo ni mfupi kuliko wote.
Ndiyo! Jojo ni mfupi kuliko mimi.
Mimi ni mfupi kuliko kaka yangu.
Kaka yangu ni mfupi kuliko dada yangu.
Dada yangu ni mfupi kuliko Ma.
Ma ni mfupi kuliko Pa.
Wow! Pa ni mrefu kuliko wote, na Jojo ni mfupi kuliko wote.

"Mrefu na Mfupi" credits

This work, “Mrefu na Mfupi”, is a derivative of “Ubude nobufushane.” as translated by Celia Bolam used under CC BY.  The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. It is based on the original story: 'ខ្ពស់និងទាប', by Huy Chheng Rattana. © Room to Read, 2015. Some changes were made to this work.

“Mrefu na Mfupi” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
